QuestData.Title: Bones That Walk
QuestData.Description: There's even fouler undead left to deal with, $n.$B$BTranquil Gardens Cemetery, further south of town, is a place you don't want to be caught in at night. The bones that rise from the ground there are cunning enough to remember how to swing an axe or cast a spell.$B$BI shouldn't need to explain how dangerous that makes them. Proceed with caution, but remember the people of Darkshire that will suffer if you falter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Althea Ebonlocke of Darkshire wants you to kill 5 Skeletal Warriors and 5 Skeletal Mages.
QuestData.RewardText: The people of Darkshire thank you, $n. You have proven yourself to be a great ally of The Night Watch.
